ide.currentUsageDefn{defnLoc: span{from: FIdx, to: TIdx}, usageLoc: UL} :-
  refGraph.Usage{definitionLoc: span{from: FIdx, to: TIdx}, usageLoc: UL} &
  ide.Cursor{idx: CIdx} &
  FIdx <= CIdx &
  CIdx <= TIdx.
----
application/graphviz
digraph G {
  "head" [label="{<head/relation> ide.currentUsageDefn|{{<head/attrs/defnLoc> defnLoc|{{<head/defnLoc/relation> span|{{<head/defnLoc/attrs/from> from|<head/defnLoc/from> FIdx}|{<head/defnLoc/attrs/to> to|<head/defnLoc/to> TIdx}}}}}|{<head/attrs/usageLoc> usageLoc|<head/usageLoc> UL}}}" shape="record"];
  "FIdx" [];
  "TIdx" [];
  "UL" [];
  "CIdx" [];
  "opt0/clause0" [label="{{{{{{{<definitionLoc/from> FIdx|<definitionLoc/attrs/from> from}|{<definitionLoc/to> TIdx|<definitionLoc/attrs/to> to}}|<definitionLoc/relation> span}}|<attrs/definitionLoc> definitionLoc}|{<usageLoc> UL|<attrs/usageLoc> usageLoc}}|<relation> refGraph.Usage}" shape="record"];
  "opt0/clause1" [label="{{{<idx> CIdx|<attrs/idx> idx}}|<relation> ide.Cursor}" shape="record"];
  "opt0/clause2" [label="{{<left> FIdx|<right> CIdx}|<binOp> \<=}" shape="record"];
  "opt0/clause3" [label="{{<left> CIdx|<right> TIdx}|<binOp> \<=}" shape="record"];
  "FIdx" -> "opt0/clause0":"definitionLoc/from" [];
  "FIdx" -> "opt0/clause2":"left" [];
  "TIdx" -> "opt0/clause0":"definitionLoc/to" [];
  "TIdx" -> "opt0/clause3":"right" [];
  "UL" -> "opt0/clause0":"usageLoc" [];
  "CIdx" -> "opt0/clause1":"idx" [];
  "CIdx" -> "opt0/clause2":"right" [];
  "CIdx" -> "opt0/clause3":"left" [];
}
